title: Chard Carey Vacuum Canister Medium, Green
features: Battery-operated Vacuum Pump Cover with Clear, Medium Sized 76 oz. Canister
Automatic Vacuum Function keeps canister sealed for up to 6 months
Dishwasher safe Canister lets you see what is inside and is BPA free
3 AA batteries (Not included) keep foods fresh up to 5x longer
Built-in Rotary Date Wheel and snap-down Seal Latches
description: The CAREY Medium Vacuum Seal Canister is a battery-operated vacuum canister that seals in seconds and helps keep food fresh up to 5 times longer. 3 AA batteries activate the vacuum pump to keep the medium-sized 76 oz. canister sealed. Snap down latches on the cover ensure proper seal fit. The automatic vacuum function keeps the canister sealed at optimal pressure for up to 6 months. The vacuum pressure is released by pressing the seal indicator button. The clear dishwasher safe canister lets you see what is inside and is BPA-free. It also features a built-in rotary pick-a-date wheel that helps keep track of date stored.
